title: ACA.Screen.Recorder.3.20.CRACKED-ONY
description:
APPLICATION : ACA Screen Recorder 3.20 *CRACKED*
	 OS : Win
       TYPE : Util
        WWW : http://www.acasystems.com/en/screenrecorder/
    RELDATE : 11/03/2008
 PROTECTION : Serial
 CRKRELDATE : 07/04/2008

INSTALLATION: Install.
              Copy .exe from crack dir. and overwrite installed one.

       NOTES: 
              you got to love acasystems humour... snippet from aca006u.dll

              PUSH EDI
              MOV ECX,9
              MOV ESI,aca006u_1002F214               ; UNICODE "Don&#039;t crack me! :("
              LEA EDI,DWORD PTR SS:[ESP+018h]
              REP MOVS DWORD PTR ES:[EDI],DWORD PTR DS:[ESI]
              XOR EAX,EAX
              MOVS WORD PTR ES:[EDI],WORD PTR DS:[ESI]
              PUSH aca006u_1002F1D4                  ; UNICODE "Oh, baby, don&#039;t crack me... :)"
              LEA ECX,DWORD PTR SS:[ESP+01Ch]
              PUSH 020h
              PUSH ECX

              by taking a shortcut around this boring dll you pretty much solve the whole protection.
              you just need to fix some eyecandy after that, can be done in many ways, nice.
              you can simply make a flag true and it will load registration infos from config.ini
              located in "application data". i felt it&#039;s pretty boring editing a file after replacing
              the exe so i just skipped that flag and rewrote the unlicensed message.
       
              more sparetime killed.. enjoy! / ONY

       ABOUT:

ACA Screen Recorder is a screen recording software, it captures the actions from your Windows screen
and saves it as a standard, easily edited, AVI (Audio-Video Interleaved) movie file. This format can
be played under Windows, as well as the Internet, unlike other programs that use proprietary formats
that may need special viewers and be difficult, if not impossible, to edit.

ACA Screen Recorder Features:

    * System-wide hot keys to start, pause, stop screen recording.

    * Easy precision visual screen area or window selection.

    * Optional sound, with choices for recording quality.

    * Show flashing rectangle when recording or paused.

    * Capture in any screen color depth

    * Automatically incrementing file names for captures using filename template.

    * Multiple video compression choices

    * Convenient, user-definable hot keys, including &#039;pause recording&#039;.

    * Frame rate and video compressor choices.

    * Audio compressor choices.

    * Configure video compressor.

    * Mouse cursor recording can be turned on or off, true shape of the cursor is recorded.
